channel.title: Welcome Message
channel.description:
Where do i change the welcome message, I'm using PI 317. I've tried config.java
This is what comes up, http://i.imgur.com/vqEuu.jpg I'm trying to change the "Welcome to RsSkills!"

item.title: Welcome Message
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

or Announcements.ini in the same place where you compile and run your server.

Read full topic

item.title: Welcome Message
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Client.Java, public void initialize, send message.

Read full topic

item.title: Welcome Message
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

I feel as though you’re going to be posting a lot of these threads…

If you’re serious about your server get a program capable of a recursive file search, otherwise you’re going to waste countless hours doing something that should take a matter of seconds, at most.

Eclipse is what I use and recommend, there are other alternatives out there though.

Nonetheless, if it’s not in your Config class try the Client class. If it’s not there, continue manually checking every file, unless you use the advise from above.

Read full topic
